name: TRACE (itch) (MinT32)
description:
A young boy must use his wits to trace the steps of a previous escape plan. An interactive story where your choices can lead to different storylines and endings. Play time is around 15 - 30 minutes.

Development

A short prototype visual novel covering the first part of a trilogy developed by MinT32 and Thaw19 for the "My First Game Jam: Summer 2021" game jam. The game was developed using Unity and Fungus. This is a pilot episode testing the viability of the ideas and practicing game development. Constructive feedback and criticism are welcome!
